snippet.title: 10 things in tech you need to know today
snippet.content:
Good morning! Here's the technology news you need to know this morning.
1. The manifesto criticises company initiatives aimed at increasing gender and racial diversity and argues that Google should instead focus on "ideological diversity."
2. The new Apple Watch could also get a redesign.
3. A new patent filing by the company outlines a way to fit mobile drone maintenance stations on trains and container ships.
4. It increased production capacity for the AirPods and the wait time is going down.
5. The company, Teneo, confirmed that it has been hired by the former Uber CEO.
6. Machines will operate with a 60% yield and churn out about 79 million displays for Apple to make iPhone 8s with.
7. Apps that are found to crash a lot will be downranked in charts.
8. It originally suspended sales of the devices because of concerns that the phones collected user data.
9. There were no humans in the front seats.
10. Leaks revealed what the application will look like.
